title.rendered: Solid Wood Table Tops – various sizes, round or square

content.rendered:
Our solid wooden table tops can be paired with the majority of our table bases! 

Our solid wooden table tops are made from solid Ash, here in the UK. We offer our solid wooden table tops in any size, thickness or edge style. Our standard and most popular sizes, thicknesses and edge styles are shown here but please get in touch for bespoke requests.

With our matching wood stains, you can ensure your table tops match your dining chairs.

Our standard lead time is 5-7 weeks for these items, as they are lovingly hand made to order. If you require these items quicker, please get in touch.

Please note, this item is for a table top only. Our table bases can be purchased separately. Our solid wooden table tops come with under-table-top support rails to prevent the table top from warping. We suggest only warm soapy water to clean this item. If an object is too hot to hold it will require a coaster or placemat.
